definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: In 1619 the first Negro slaves were brought to America from West Africa.
sentences.chinese: 1619年第一批黑人奴隸從西非運到美洲。

sentences.english: "What you can do now, at best, is to assign people to a part of West Africa, " Jackson says.
sentences.chinese: 現在能做的頂多是將人們劃分爲西非的一部分。

sentences.english: The scientists took the boric acid sweet bait to the West African nation of Mali.
sentences.chinese: 科學家將這種含糖硼酸誘捕劑帶到了西非的馬裏。

sentences.english: And in West Africa, the gesture is even more insulting than the upraised middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 而在西非，這姿態甚至比舉起中指更具侮辱性。

sentences.english: Tema is the port of Ghana in West Bfrica.
sentences.chinese: 特馬，是西非加納的港口。

sentences.english: West Africa has not had a case since the first of May.
sentences.chinese: 自今年五月一日以來，西非沒有出現過一例病例。

sentences.english: He recently met with West African health officials in the Ghanaian capital, Accra.
sentences.chinese: 最近他與西非健康官員在加納首都阿克拉會面。

sentences.english: The convoy of Chinese peacekeeping transportation detachment are traveling across the vast forest in west Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中國維和運輸分隊的車隊穿越西非茫茫叢林地帶。

sentences.english: Monkeypox occurs primarily in remote villages in Central and West Africa, near tropical rainforests.
sentences.chinese: 猴痘主要在中非和西非靠近熱帶雨林的邊遠村莊發生。

sentences.english: Anchora hails from Numbani, and has a West African accent.
sentences.chinese: 安喬拉來自努巴尼，有着西非口音。

sentences.english: Grains of Paradise is a spice native to West Africa, in the zingiberaceae family.
sentences.chinese: 砂仁是種源於西非的調味料，屬於姜科。

sentences.english: Some west African states are still recovering from civil war.
sentences.chinese: 有些西非國家還處於內戰恢復期。

sentences.english: Tema is the port of Ghana in West Africa.
sentences.chinese: 特馬，是西非加納的港口。

sentences.english: Countries in West and Central Africa face the greatest obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 西非和中非的國家面臨更大的障礙。

sentences.english: The two sides intend to enhance communication and exchanges regarding aid for health in West Africa.
sentences.chinese: 雙方願就西非地區衛生援助事宜加強溝通交流。

sentences.english: Higher education in British West Africa had gone through several stages of development for almost one hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 英屬西非地區的高等教育經歷了近百年的發展歷程。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
